doc.field: Series IV: Officers and Staff-Administrative Files
Series IV: Officers and Staff-Administrative Files
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records

Raglan George, Jr. was elected Executive Director of 1707 in 2002. Previous roles within the Council included director of Local 95 (Head Start) and Local 205 (Day Care Employees). Material in this subseries (approximately three boxes of records) generally relates to the administration and concerns of these locals and predates George's tenure as Executive Director.
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
